summary: A pipeline that integrates a variational auto‑encoder, a frozen T5 text encoder, a 3‑D transformer and a scheduler to convert textual prompts (with optional control inputs) into video frames, handling prompt encoding, latent preparation, denoising, and decoding.
business_intent: Provides developers and content creators with an easy‑to‑use interface for generating customized videos from text, supporting controllable generation for marketing, entertainment, education, and other media production use cases.
